About Me

I'm a software engineering student in the University of Malaya. My goal is to be a front-end web developer or perhaps a full stack developer. For now I had study programming languages such as Java, JavaScript, PHP and currently want to learn Go Language as my next challenge. In front-end development, right now I'm starting to learn some frameworks for CSS which is Bootstrap 4 and ReactJS for Javascript. I would love if you can help me out to understand them better in this journey.
